alert.note: Alert for Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:51PM CDT until June 11 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LONOKE AND SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 351 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wrightsville, or 12 miles southeast of Downtown Little Rock, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... England... Wrightsville... Keo... Estes... Toltec Mounds State Park... Coy... Hensley... Bredlow Corner... Toltec... Tomberlin... Woodson... Pettus... Terry Lock and Dam... Blakemore... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
